Class InputValidation

java.lang.Object
com.s11group2.profiling_database.Util.InputValidation
public class InputValidation extends Object
Utility class for input validation and reading input.

    • isSeniorCitizen

      public static int isSeniorCitizen(int age)
      Determines if a person is a senior citizen based on their age.
      Parameters:
      age - the age of the person
      Returns:
      1 if the person is a senior citizen (age 65 or older), 0 otherwise
